translation.en: Welcome back to The Diving Rose,
translation.es: Bienvenidos a La rosa del buceo,

translation.en: coming to you from our little slice of paradise, Cape Mercy.
translation.es: filmando en nuestro pequeño paraíso, Cape Mercy.

translation.en: If you're new to my channel, I'm Lauren, and these are my friends.
translation.es: Si no conocen mi canal, soy Lauren y estas son mis amigas.

translation.en: Hi!
We're ready to hunt for treasure. Are you guys coming?
Let's go!
-What a find! -Woo!
Open it! Open it!
Cool.
Typical of the Victorian era.
This is so you can keep loved ones close as you travel.
translation.es: Para mantener cerca a tus seres queridos.

translation.en: -Careful! Hey! - It survived a hundred years underwater.
translation.es: - ¡Cuidado! - ¡Oye! Sobrevivió cien años bajo el agua, ¿sobrevivirá a Stevie?

translation.en: -Let's hope it survives Stevie! -Ha.
translation.es: Sobrevivió cien años bajo el agua, ¿sobrevivirá a Stevie?

translation.en: I bet this is worth some coin! [growls]
Hey, hey, hey. We return lost items, not sell them.
translation.es: ¡Oye! ¡Devolvemos los artículos perdidos, no los vendemos!

translation.en: Now, I think the current's dragged in from the Cape Mercy shipwrecks.
translation.es: La marea lo debe haber traído del naufragio de Cape Mercy.

translation.en: Now, that would be a dive.
Sure, if you like shark-infested waters.
translation.es: Si te gustan las aguas infestadas de tiburones.

translation.en: -We are never doing that dive. -No shark-infested waters.
translation.es: Si te gustan las aguas infestadas de tiburones. ¡Nunca lo haremos!

translation.en: Never say 'never'.
I wonder who she was.
-That's coming in fast. -We better go. Now!
translation.es: Se acerca rápido. Mejor nos vamos. Ahora.

translation.en: Quick, put the mainsail out.
Ahoy, Sea Dog!
Why weren't you lot in earlier? Sorry, Grandad. The weather was clear this morning.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no vinieron antes? - El clima estaba bien.

translation.en: It suddenly turned on us.
[grandad] This is no summer squall.
translation.es: No es una tormenta de verano.

translation.en: This is gonna be a big one!
Better get her into the cove.
Tighter!
Here, let me.
I got it.
Got it.
There you go.
Oh! My phone! I left it in the boat.
translation.es: Dejé mi teléfono en el bote.

translation.en: You guys just, just go.
My mother will have expected me home hours ago. I better go.
translation.es: Mi madre me esperaba hace horas. Mejor me voy.

translation.en: Time to batten the hatches.
But what about Lauren?
Oh, it's fine, really. Go.
-I'll wait, it's... -No, no, it's OK. Ok.
Yes!
♪ Treasure long forgotten waits for thee ♪ ♪ Clouds will thicken and the moon will hide ♪
[man] But we'll continue to search until Lauren is found safely... Hey, Chief.
Stevie, you'll know as soon as we find anything.
I know, but you've gotta let us help, Chief. We can be useful.
No, not again.
What if we take one of the cruisers out? Huh? Fresh eyes.
translation.es: Podemos ir en yate. Más pares de ojos.

translation.en: If you wanna help, Lauren, leave it to the professionals!
What if she never took the boat out. She could be lost on land.
translation.es: ¿Y si nunca tomó el bote? - Podría estar en tierra. - Sigue con los carteles.

translation.en: Keep putting up the posters, OK?
translation.es: - Podría estar en tierra. - Sigue con los carteles.

translation.en: OK.
They're looking in the wrong place. Lauren knows better than to sail the 'Indy' headfirst into a cyclone.
translation.es: ¡Están buscando en el lugar equivocado! ¡Lauren no navegaría en un ciclón!

translation.en: Exactly - why would Lauren help pack the skiff, drag it onto the sand
translation.es: ¡Exacto! ¿Y por qué nos ayudaría a desmontar el bote,

translation.en: just to unpack it and haul it back out ten minutes later?
translation.es: para montarlo y navegar diez minutos más tarde?

translation.en: She wouldn't.
[man on radio] Cape Mercy Tower, helicopter 727, 10 north-west, in-bound.
translation.es: Torre Cape Mercy, helicóptero 727, 10 noroeste, acercándose.

translation.en: [girl] That's a capsized boat down there.
translation.es: Hay un bote dado vuelta allí abajo.

translation.en: [man] A cyclone'll do that.
Your specialty, my nightmare.
Give your dad a chance, kiddo.
translation.es: Dale una oportunidad a tu papá.

translation.en: You can't have all your best holidays with Mum.
translation.es: No puedes siempre pasar las vacaciones con mamá.

translation.en: Fine. But, as long as I get to keep my feet dry.
translation.es: Siempre y cuando pueda mantener los pies secos.

translation.en: Yeah, we'll see.
[woman on radio] Cleared for landing, 727.
We're representing a town in crisis, not attending a French film festival, Anna.
translation.es: Representamos a un pueblo en crisis, no a un festival de cine francés.

translation.en: The Chief is going out again this morning, isn't he?
translation.es: ¿El jefe volverá a salir esta mañana?

translation.en: Where do you think they'll be looking? The northern coastline?
I'm sure they'll be very thorough.
Well, if they find the 'Indy' and the mast is down,
translation.es: Si encuentran al Indy sin el mástil instalado,

translation.en: that proves she couldn't have been sailing it.
We've spoken about this.
We just really don't think she took the boat out, Mother.
translation.es: No creemos que haya sacado el bote.

translation.en: Lauren was last seen at the boat, you said so yourselves.
translation.es: La vieron por última vez en el bote.

translation.en: She just went to get her phone.
translation.es: Solo fue a buscar su teléfono.

translation.en: And did you see her come back?
And now the boat is gone.
Dr. John Martin, engineer.
And my daughter Izzie.
Renee Volkov, mayor. And this is my daughter Anna.
translation.es: Renee Volkov, alcaldesa. Y esta es mi hija, Anna.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the hotel has no hot water,
translation.es: El hotel no tiene agua caliente,

translation.en: so you'll be staying in our guest accommodation for the time being.
translation.es: se quedarán en nuestra habitación de huéspedes.

translation.en: -I trust that's suitable. -That's very kind, thank you.
Well, there's a lot to survey before the town meeting.
translation.es: Hay mucho que estudiar antes de la reunión.

translation.en: We best get started. Anna, settle Izzie in and show her around.
translation.es: Mejor empecemos. Anna, muéstrale el pueblo a Izzie.

translation.en: [quietly] Actually, I thought I'd...
Anna is a gracious host. I'm sure you'll have a wonderful time together.
translation.es: Anna es una buena anfitriona. La pasarán muy bien juntas.

translation.en: Town meeting, six o'clock.
translation.es: La reunión es a las seis.

translation.en: I love your necklace, it's super vintage.
Oh, it's OK. You don't have to do that.
translation.es: No, está bien. No necesitas hacer eso.

translation.en: I've done this a lot
and... some poor person always gets roped into showing around the new girl.
translation.es: Hice esto muchas veces. Un desafortunado siempre debe mostrarme el pueblo.

translation.en: Well, I'm the mayor's daughter and that comes with certain obligations.
translation.es: Soy la hija de la alcaldesa. Tengo ciertas obligaciones.

translation.en: I don't mind.
You can ride a bike, can't you?
-[sighs] -Who's this?
That is my great-grandmother.
The heroine of Cape Mercy.
We're the last remaining descendants of the shipwreck.
[woman] Anna?
Um, you can put your stuff in the guest bedroom, I won't be long.
translation.es: Deja todo en la habitación de invitados. Ya vuelvo.

translation.en: -And then I'll show you around. -Sure.
Hey, but... Anna.
Stevie! The table!
The last time we saw Lauren, she was here.
translation.es: La última vez que la vimos, estaba aquí.

translation.en: - Right where we parked the 'Indy'. -Right.
We find the boat, they'll see that the mast is down.
translation.es: Si lo encontramos, verán que no tiene el mástil.

translation.en: No-one can pilot a boat without a mast.
translation.es: No se puede navegar sin mástil.

translation.en: They'll have to accept the storm washed it out to sea.
translation.es: Comprenderán que la tormenta lo llevó al mar.

translation.en: -And then they'll start a land search. -Exactly.
translation.es: La buscaran en tierra firme. Exacto. Debe haber tenido un accidente en el camino.

translation.en: She probably got caught out riding home.
translation.es: Exacto. Debe haber tenido un accidente en el camino.

translation.en: You know, we'll find Lauren at the bottom of a landslide with a broken leg,
translation.es: La encontraremos con una pierna rota,

translation.en: furious we didn't find her sooner.
We'll be back in this booth having lodestar burgers by Wednesday.
translation.es: Pronto estaremos comiendo hamburguesas de nuevo.

translation.en: Can I help you?
Yeah, hi, I'm Izzie.
[Anna] She's just arrived. The engineer's daughter.
translation.es: Acaba de llegar. Es la hija del ingeniero.

translation.en: -I'm Maddie. -Hi.
-This is a private meeting. -Stevie!
What?! It is!
Isn't it, Anna?
Usually, yes, but I'm showing her...
I'm not here to intrude.
I'll just... Just wait here.
So a regular tide wouldn't have washed the 'Indy' from shore. But a cyclone...
translation.es: Una marea normal no se lo habría llevado, pero un ciclón sí.

translation.en: It totally could've dragged it up the northern coastline and anyone on board.
translation.es: Podría haberlo arrastrado hasta la costa norte.

translation.en: I know, but this is a big stretch of coastline,
translation.es: Es un gran tramo de costa.

translation.en: a small boat won't be easy to find.
translation.es: No es fácil encontrar un bote.

translation.en: [Anna] She's right. A thorough search could take days.
translation.es: Tiene razón. La búsqueda podría llevar días.

translation.en: Not if we commandeer a boat.
I saw a boat.
When we flew in.
Was the mast still intact?
-I couldn't tell it had overturned. -[sighs]
Do you think you could locate it again?
Yeah, I think so. [Izzie] Sorry, but who's Lauren?
translation.es: Creo que sí. Lo siento, ¿quién es Lauren?

translation.en: -[Anna] She's our friend. -Oh.
And she's missing.
'Yacht's All Folks'? No.
'Seas the Day'? Eugh!
'Usain Boat'.
OK, that's actually pretty funny.
-[Maddie] Stevie! Hurry!
Careful.
Mm. Smashing.
-Stevie! -[grunts]
-Come on. -Come on, Izzie!
-[Maddie] Izzie! Jump! -[snorting]
[grandad] Oi!
[exclaims] Where are we going?
Stevie Harrison, you have that back in one piece!
[grandad] Not a scratch now!
[Anna] That is not the 'Indy'.
Might be something worth checking out.
[Stevie] What do you think?
Shall we?
But you don't know what's down there. I guess we'll find out.
translation.es: - ¡Pero no saben qué hay ahí abajo! - Lo averiguaremos.

translation.en: [Maddie] It's OK, Izzie, we never know what's down there.
translation.es: Está bien. Nunca sabemos qué hay.

translation.en: That's the fun part.
Doing OK, little buddy?
Yeah! Why wouldn't I be?
[Izzie] I'm in the middle of the ocean with three complete strangers on a stolen boat.
translation.es: Estoy en medio del océano con tres extrañas en un barco robado.

translation.en: [Izzie] So how long has your friend been missing? Three days.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo desapareció su amiga? - Hace tres días.

translation.en: We don't think she took the boat out. We're just trying to convince everyone else.
translation.es: No creemos que se haya ido en bote. Queremos convencer al resto.

translation.en: Medical deliveries.
Must have got lost overboard during the cyclone.
Ha! We’re all gonna be in Grandma’s good books today, girls.
-It's her heart medication. -[chuckles]
You look like you need a hand. Welcome back, man!
translation.es: - Parece que necesitas una mano. - Bienvenido.

translation.en: Why didn't you call? I would have come to visit.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no llamaste? Te habría visitado.

translation.en: Juvie is not the sort of place you wanna visit. Trust me.
translation.es: El correccional no es un lindo lugar para visitar.

translation.en: Well, we were all thinking about you.
How'd you go?
It turns out my sense of humor... Not really a big hit with the other inmates.
translation.es: Mi sentido del humor no fue un éxito con los otros reclusos.

translation.en: I’ll never end up back there again, Henry.
If there's anything I can do to make that happen, let me know and I’ll do it.
translation.es: Si puedo hacer algo para que así sea, avísame.

translation.en: You won't have to.
I’m gonna turn things around.
I'm gonna pay off the stupid fine.
I'm gonna go back to school...
And I'm gonna get Stevie back.
Have you seen her yet?
Nah.
She still mad?
Well, you stole a boat, then you sunk it,
translation.es: Robaste un barco. Y luego lo hundiste.

translation.en: and then you landed yourself three months in prison.
translation.es: Y terminaste preso por tres meses.

translation.en: - So yeah. -[both] She's still mad.
When did you get in? First ferry I could get on.
translation.es: - ¿Cuándo volviste? - Tomé el primer ferry que pude.

translation.en: Man, this storm has done a real number on this place.
translation.es: La tormenta causó estragos en este lugar.

translation.en: You haven’t heard. Heard what?
Lauren’s missing.
What?!
No-one's seen her since the storm and...
translation.es: Nadie la ha visto desde la tormenta

translation.en: The... 'Indy' is gone too.
That doesn’t make any sense.
They’ve had search parties out and everything.
translation.es: Sí, hay grupos de búsqueda y todo.

translation.en: I’m headed out there now.
Are you OK?
Yeah. She’ll turn up.
Yeah. Of course she will.
Look, I gotta go help with the search but...
It's really good to have you back, man.
translation.es: pero es bueno tenerte de vuelta.

translation.en: It's good to see you too.
-Just in time, vnuchka! -Babushka!
You should be off your feet, resting.
[scoffs] Please don’t fuss, dear Anna. I like the cool air.
translation.es: No te preocupes, Anna. ¡Me gusta el aire fresco!

translation.en: Reminds me of our ancestors back in Mother Russia.
translation.es: Me recuerda a nuestros ancestros en Rusia.

translation.en: Ah, Madeline, Stephanie, you look like you could do with something sweet.
translation.es: Madeline, Stephanie, creo que les vendría bien algo dulce.

translation.en: -Thank you! - Thanks Grandma Reg.
You must be Isabelle. Welcome. [laughs]
-I've got you something. -Oh.
Oh. My heart medication!
You clever things. [kissing] Ah.
I may look robust, but beneath this spritely exterior,
translation.es: Puedo parecer robusta, pero bajo este exterior alegre,

translation.en: I am a very tired woman.
-Come along. -Oh.
[mayor] Good evening.
First and foremost, thank you to everyone in the community
translation.es: En primer lugar, gracias a toda la comunidad por ayudar a limpiar.

translation.en: for your continued clean-up efforts.
translation.es: gracias a toda la comunidad por ayudar a limpiar.

translation.en: Our town is finally starting to look like itself again.
translation.es: Nuestro pueblo empieza a verse como siempre.

translation.en: I'm sorry we didn't find your boat.
translation.es: Lamento no haber encontrado tu barco.

translation.en: Better than finding it with the mast up and no Lauren.
translation.es: Mejor que encontrarlo con mástil y sin Lauren.

translation.en: -[mayor] The island's power... -There's still hope.
[mayor] ...infrastructure has been significantly damaged.
translation.es: La infraestructura se ha dañado mucho.

translation.en: For the foreseeable future, we will experience rolling blackouts.
translation.es: En los próximos tiempos sufriremos apagones.

translation.en: I know most of you have personal generators.
translation.es: Sé que la mayoría tiene generadores.

translation.en: So please use them.
In other good news, renowned structural engineer Dr. John Martin has arrived.
translation.es: Buenas noticias: llegó el renombrado ingeniero estructural, el Dr. John Martin.

translation.en: Alongside the Emergency Management Team,
translation.es: Trabajará junto con el equipo de emergencias

translation.en: Dr. Martin will work with the local council to get Cape Mercy up and running again
translation.es: y el consejo local para poner a Cape Mercy de pie.

translation.en: in time to continue our oldest tradition, the annual Salvation Day Festival.
translation.es: A tiempo para continuar con nuestra tradición más antigua, el Festival del Día de la Salvación.

translation.en: Yes.
-Anyone seen Henry? -Mm-mm.
[Anna] Chief doesn’t look so good.
translation.es: El jefe no se ve bien.

translation.en: Who’s Chief?
Chief of Police. -Lauren’s dad. -Oh.
translation.es: El jefe de policía. El papá de Lauren.

translation.en: As you all know, one of our precious daughters, Lauren Rose, is still missing.
translation.es: Como todos saben, una de nuestras hijas, Lauren Rose, sigue desaparecida.

translation.en: As mayor, I can assure you
that the search-and-rescue efforts will continue until...
translation.es: que los esfuerzos de búsqueda y rescate continuarán hasta…

translation.en: As mayor, I can assure you that the search-and-rescue efforts will continue...
translation.es: Como alcaldesa, le aseguro que los esfuerzos de búsqueda y rescate continuarán…

translation.en: Easy, Henry! Easy.
Bring it in, Henry.
[Maddie] The mast...
The mast is up.
